requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Linux
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Game is drawn at 1080p, but will scale down or up appropriately.
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • Additional Notes: Almost any computer made after 2011 will run this game.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
